member.name: T:Penguin.Authentication.OWA.OWAValidator
member.summary: Validates an Email/Password combination against Outlook Web Access with the intent of validating organizational domain credentials without access to the internal domain server

member.name: M:Penguin.Authentication.OWA.OWAValidator.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the OWA Validator

member.name: M:Penguin.Authentication.OWA.OWAValidator.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the given Email/Password combination allows for login on the OWA server
